  <div data-hook="genome-widget" class="a-row a-spacing-mini"><a href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AEUHSKBV2ADJTTXVB55RN7UQQZTA/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_gw_tr?ie=UTF8" class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"><noscript><img src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Apple nerd</span></div></a></div><div class="a-row"><a data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base review-title-content a-text-bold" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R1MZVYL3ULXVYC/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B0C8PT7DF5"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5 review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span>







  
  
    <span>The King is back, for a niche audience</span>
  
</a></div><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date">Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-color-secondary">Color: Black<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Style: Studio Pro<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Set: Without AppleCare+</span><i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i><a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=G75XTB7MBMBTXP6W"><span data-hook="avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></a></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span data-hook="review-body" class="a-size-base review-text"><div data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" style="max-height: none; height: 300px;"><div data-hook="review-collapsed" data-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content reviewText review-text-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content" style="padding-bottom: 20px;">







  
  
    <span>I loved my Beats Solo headphones as a teenager. Im talking monster cable beats. Nothing was cooler, the bass was thundering, and while it didnt sound great, it sounded so much better than the iPod in ears or my dads old crappy walkman on-ears I was used to. I listen to mostly electronic music, bass/dubstep, house &amp; techno, all of that with some hip/hop and pop sprinkled in as well. I also love movies.<br><br>As an adult at home, I have my beyerdynamic dt 770 pros for mixing and editing with. I have a pair of AirPods Pro 2s for travel and day to day usage. Recently, I have started to work from home a lot more in meetings, and there has been a lot of construction outside my window, and I hate having things stuck in my ears for hours on end so I was in the market for a pair of noise canceling over ear headphones.<br><br>My partner has a pair of AirPods Max, I found the sound to be really great, detailed with good sound stage and flat great for voice but clinical and safe in all respects and lacking the bass I was looking for. Even with the top-of-the-pack anc and apple integration features I was used to on my in-ears I never could swallow the price. Also they were comfortable, but so heavy and not suited for long periods of wear. And the case was weird.<br><br>So I tried the bereydynamic lagoon ANCs. They were garbage. Impossible to use the controls and pair with devices, sounded really good but not as good as I would expect from this brand, and the issues go on and on. They did have good bass, but the anc barely worked. I liked them at a lot at first, but they fell apart so quickly.<br><br>Then I saw that apple had brand new beats headphones, and were 30% off on Amazon. I had to try them, the nostalgia hit hard and Im so happy they didnt change the iconic design from the studio 2s which I also liked as a replacement for my solos. I. Am. Floored. Super lightweight yet feel very solid and no creaking, apple integration features (i consider no auto switching to be a plus tbh, but icloud pairing is a must. Works very well with Apple TV), but the sound! Is so FUN. Its like Im in a concert hall with huge racks of speakers and towers of subwoofers. So much better than my old beats, by a landslide. Great instrument separation, and decent soundstage, sounds less like a wall of sound like my pro 2s do but not as wide and spatial as the max. A little bright for my taste, but never enough to cause fatigue. None of them come close to the 770s of course - would I recommend these for classical? Or acoustic? Never. Or for any type actual professional work? No. But if you like electronic, you will have so much fun enjoying music with these. The ANC and transparency is very very good, identical to my AirPods Pro, I would argue maybe even better than the max in some situations. The mic quality is good, not as good as my AirPods but good enough for work calls. I also love watching movies, and having multi-channel support like my pro 2s is epic. I absolutely love these - and am so happy I got them!<br></span>
  
</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header" style="opacity: 1; display: block;"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-interaction-events="click" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" aria-label="Toggle full review text" aria-expanded="false" role="button" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read more&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read less&quot;}" data-csa-c-id="vkefb4-cgppta-vcni5h-h2x7lw"><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Read more</span></a></div></div></span></div><div data-hook="review-comments" class="a-row review-comments cr-vote-action-bar"><span class="cr-vote" data-hook="review-voting-widget">

  <div data-hook="genome-widget" class="a-row a-spacing-mini"><a href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AGKJLU6WXNGP3FN3MUPLM4AYENBQ/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_gw_tr?ie=UTF8" class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"><noscript><img src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Notyours</span></div></a></div><div class="a-row"><a data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base review-title-content a-text-bold" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R2FRRY9Z3PB7XW/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B0C8PT7DF5"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5 review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span>







  
  
    <span>No ear discomfort! Lightweight and not clunky! Great for WFH!</span>
  
</a></div><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date">Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2024</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-color-secondary">Color: Moon<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Style: Studio Pro<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Set: Without AppleCare+</span><i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i><a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=G75XTB7MBMBTXP6W"><span data-hook="avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></a></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span data-hook="review-body" class="a-size-base review-text"><div data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" style="max-height: none; height: 300px;"><div data-hook="review-collapsed" data-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content reviewText review-text-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content" style="padding-bottom: 20px;">







  
  
    <span>First off, as a Beats headphone user since 2015, this company produces quality products (my original Beats from 2015 is still going strong albeit obsolete features-wise). However, one complaint I have with the Beats and Beats Studio 3 is the ear pain after wearing them for several hours due to the uncomfy earpads. That said, this Studio Pro is so comfy on my head/ears and I don't feel uncomfortable at all! This model also feels lighter than the Studio 3s.<br><br>The sound quality is super crisp, though no noticeable differences between it and ANC noise cancellation on the Studio 3. Apparently, the 3.5mm aux cord is supposed to enhance sound quality, but I don't know how much more you can -- the wireless version is already amazing. I work from home and am constantly in calls. One reason I bought the Studio Pros is for its state-of-the-art background noise filter on calls. I've given these a test drive on a workday and they work like a dream. Now I can talk to clients without worrying whether they'll hear my neighbor shouting at his dogs or mowing his lawn.<br><br>Design-wise, the color is beautiful. I am not a fan of the Kardashians, but I absolutely love the stylish case and cords that came with the Kim K's! I am also impressed at the long battery life, which is twice as long as the Studio 3's.<br><br>I think the original price is ridiculous (an extra $100 for certain colors just because they're "Kim K?" They'd better be able to make my dinner and clean my house!) but I'm glad I snagged these for almost half off during the Prime Day sale. I would definitely recommend these.<br></span>
  
</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header" style="opacity: 1; display: block;"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-interaction-events="click" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" aria-label="Toggle full review text" aria-expanded="false" role="button" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read more&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read less&quot;}" data-csa-c-id="jnl4np-o7791i-kgzjhz-h0djwh"><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Read more</span></a></div></div></span></div><div data-hook="review-comments" class="a-row review-comments cr-vote-action-bar"><span class="cr-vote" data-hook="review-voting-widget">

  </div></div></div></div><div id="R1541QYEAABA8P" data-hook="review" class="a-section review aok-relative"><div id="R1541QYEAABA8P-review-card" class="a-row a-spacing-none"><div id="customer_review-R1541QYEAABA8P" class="a-section celwidget" data-csa-c-id="skwoss-ha2i03-pvljpl-en459t" data-cel-widget="customer_review-R1541QYEAABA8P"><script>

  <div data-hook="genome-widget" class="a-row a-spacing-mini"><a href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AG72I5ZTRQMXMHRAY33VP7UCGPEQ/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_gw_tr?ie=UTF8" class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"><noscript><img src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Tara M.</span></div></a></div><div class="a-row"><a data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base review-title-content a-text-bold" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R1541QYEAABA8P/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B0C8PT7DF5"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5 review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span>







  
  
    <span>Color is gorgeous and quality is excellent</span>
  
</a></div><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date">Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2024</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-color-secondary">Color: Earth<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Style: Studio Pro<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Set: Without AppleCare+</span><i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i><a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=G75XTB7MBMBTXP6W"><span data-hook="avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></a></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span data-hook="review-body" class="a-size-base review-text"><div data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" style="max-height:300px"><div data-hook="review-collapsed" data-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content reviewText review-text-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content">







  
  
    <span>I bought the color earth. The color is pure chocolate earthy brown and sooo beautiful!!<br><br>The fit on my head is really nice. I have a smaller/thinner head so its hard for me to find over the ear headphones that stay. There is a cushioned lining under the top that has a grip texture so they stay in place. The cups cover my ears entirely and for comfortably.<br><br>They connect seamlessly to my iPhone and the control of adjustment to the volume is great. There is noise canceling feature and transparent feature. The button to turn the headphones on is easily accessed as well as the function to skip, volume up/down, pause and Siri as well.<br><br>They came with a matching brown high quality aux cord and a charging cord. The headphones came 50% charged so you can use them right away but also charged very quickly to 100%!<br><br>The sound quality is incredible. When Im at the gym it almost sounds like Im in my living room with surround sound. I love them so much.<br></span>
  
</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header" style="opacity: 0; display: none;"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-interaction-events="click" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" aria-label="Toggle full review text" aria-expanded="false" role="button" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read more&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read less&quot;}" data-csa-c-id="w57f3f-twl148-l5gq07-bz1dk8"><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Read more</span></a></div></div></span></div><div class="a-popover-preload" id="a-popover-R1541QYEAABA8P_gallerySection_main">











 
  		 


<div id="R1541QYEAABA8P_image_popover" data-hook="image-popover" class="a-section cr-lightbox-popover-container">

        <div class="cr-lightbox-main-image-container">

    <div class="a-section cr-lightbox-review-information">
        <div class="a-section a-spacing-mini cr-review-stars-and-title">

            <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">
                <a href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AG72I5ZTRQMXMHRAY33VP7UCGPEQ/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_gw_pop?ie=UTF8" class="a-profile cr-lightbox-customer-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png" class="" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png" style=""><noscript><img src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Tara M.</span></div></a>
            </div>

            <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5 cr-lightbox-review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i>
            <span class="a-size-base cr-lightbox-review-title a-text-bold">
                Color is gorgeous and quality is excellent
            </span>
            <br>
            
                <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary cr-lightbox-review-origin">
                    
                        
                        
                            
                                
                                
                                    Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2024
                                
                            
                        
                    
                </span>
            
        </div>
        <span class="a-size-base cr-lightbox-review-body">
            I bought the color earth. The color is pure chocolate earthy brown and sooo beautiful!!<br><br>The fit on my head is really nice. I have a smaller/thinner head so its hard for me to find over the ear headphones that stay. There is a cushioned lining under the top that has a grip texture so they stay in place. The cups cover my ears entirely and for comfortably.<br><br>They connect seamlessly to my iPhone and the control of adjustment to the volume is great. There is noise canceling feature and transparent feature. The button to turn the headphones on is easily accessed as well as the function to skip, volume up/down, pause and Siri as well.<br><br>They came with a matching brown high quality aux cord and a charging cord. The headphones came 50% charged so you can use them right away but also charged very quickly to 100%!<br><br>The sound quality is incredible. When Im at the gym it almost sounds like Im in my living room with surround sound. I love them so much.<br>
        </span>
        <div class="a-section a-spacing-top-base">
            <span class="a-size-medium a-color-secondary">
                Images in this review
            </span>

  <div data-hook="genome-widget" class="a-row a-spacing-mini"><a href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AEWQQRPKBK7F5IDLHT2VQLT523BQ/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_gw_tr?ie=UTF8" class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/028c594a-82a7-495a-bef5-9d1ba7bcd9e6._CR140%2C0%2C840%2C840_SX460_.jpg"><noscript><img src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/028c594a-82a7-495a-bef5-9d1ba7bcd9e6._CR140%2C0%2C840%2C840_SX460_.jpg"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Lori B.</span></div></a></div><div class="a-row"><a data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base review-title-content a-text-bold" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R139E82K7RNU8U/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B0C8PT7DF5"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5 review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span>







  
  
    <span>Amazing Headphones!</span>
  
</a></div><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date">Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2024</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-color-secondary">Color: Moon<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Style: Studio Pro<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Set: Without AppleCare+</span><i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i><a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=G75XTB7MBMBTXP6W"><span data-hook="avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></a></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span data-hook="review-body" class="a-size-base review-text"><div data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" style="max-height:300px"><div data-hook="review-collapsed" data-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content reviewText review-text-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content">







  
  
    <span>These headphones are truly amazing.  The sound quality, build construction, and comfort are supreme.  I bought the moon color and love it!  So far the battery life is great, I have used 10-15% after all-day use.  You could even use these connected to a USB-C cable for incredible lossless sound, as well as a regular wired jack connection.  The nose canceling and transparency modes work very well.  I was able to get them for a great deal during Prime Day this month, they are well worth the money.  They are lighter and more comfortable than my Airpods Max, for which there is no wired connection options available.  They also fold up and come with a great carry case.  I am very pleased with this purchase.<br></span>
  
</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header" style="opacity: 0; display: none;"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-interaction-events="click" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" aria-label="Toggle full review text" aria-expanded="false" role="button" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read more&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read less&quot;}" data-csa-c-id="pco9qb-sr1r7o-jkqgp9-3okntz"><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Read more</span></a></div></div></span></div><div data-hook="review-comments" class="a-row review-comments cr-vote-action-bar"><span class="cr-vote" data-hook="review-voting-widget">

  <div data-hook="genome-widget" class="a-row a-spacing-mini"><div class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"><noscript><img src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Ming Fen Liu</span></div></div></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-none"><i data-hook="cmps-review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5 review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base review-title a-color-base review-title-content a-text-bold">







  
  
    <span>What a beautiful headphone with less bass!</span>
  
</span></div><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date">Reviewed in Canada on October 11, 2024</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-color-secondary">Color: Dune<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Style: Studio Pro<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Set: Without AppleCare+</span><i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i><a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=G75XTB7MBMBTXP6W"><span data-hook="avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></a></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span data-hook="review-body" class="a-size-base review-text"><div data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" style="max-height: none; height: 300px;"><div data-hook="review-collapsed" data-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content reviewText review-text-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content" style="padding-bottom: 20px;">







  
  
    <span>i've being a professional sarcastic audiophile for 80 years now. and i can listen to frequency from 20-20k easily without any equipment. recently amazon have this amazing prime day even that i took advantage of them and purchase this apple studio pro x kim kardashian headphone at a whopping almost 50% off discount. everybody bought out all the kim kardashian special edition because it sounded better than the regular apple studio pro. my colour i picked was dune. which is the closest colour to the mankind that God perfected on us. i picked dune because my whole family is dune color, my dog, my cat, all my pets is dune colour. my car is dune colour. my house is dune colour, my friend kim kardashian is dune colour. so i purchase dune colour to match everything. upon unboxing the colour of dune kept pouring out to my face like God's punishing light shinning from heaven on me and flush away all my dune sins. thats how powerful it is. the apple studio x kim is amazing. i was so excited upon arrival and the whole thing is so called eco friendly. every box is made up from recycle garabge and then sold to us again. thats how the mother earth is protected. i can't hide my disappointment on this unit due to the fact i thought the headphone comes with kim kardashian. when i unbox it i was trying to find kim and was expecting he/she to come out the box. unfortunetly my unit did not come with her. but i would not give it 4 start just because she/he did not show up. you might ask how does this ear punishing headphone better than the regular apple studio pro? good question. it comes with kim. and no its not kimchy a well known korean cabbage dish. its kim as in kardashian. her unit sound better because the word kim is on the box. and the dune colour also improves sound frequency when kim is on the box obviously. with kim unit you are telling people that you are better. you are richer. you are more powerful. you are very kim and you headphone sounds better, dont take my word for you. you can personally reach kim itself. now lets talk about kim frequency. what makes it better. upon listening through my well trained 80 years of audiophile experience when i instantly put on the headphone. i can hear the kimsubass frequency. it is deep. the kimhighbass and kimlow bass are low lowered due to the request of kim to apple thats how she wants it. the kimtreble is high. very high. after a while you ears will have kim sound if you listen to loud. so make sure you lower your apple studio pro x kim around 50db to protect your hearing. we wouldn't want to deal with kimtitanus in the future forever. using kim to listen to music is amazing. but with amazon music service. OMG its like Kim herself is singing to you. thats how amazing it is. i took advantage of amazon music for 4 months free and i enjoyed every last bit of it. definetly try out amazon music. dont miss out. it have better resolution and all. what amazon tell you should be true.<br></span>
  
</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header" style="opacity: 1; display: block;"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-interaction-events="click" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" aria-label="Toggle full review text" aria-expanded="false" role="button" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read more&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read less&quot;}" data-csa-c-id="eo15ob-mdgqj1-iagpcc-n1zb7o"><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Read more</span></a></div></div></span></div><div data-hook="review-comments" class="a-row review-comments cr-vote-action-bar"><span class="cr-vote" data-hook="review-voting-widget">

  <div data-hook="genome-widget" class="a-row a-spacing-mini"><div class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"><noscript><img src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Michael</span></div></div></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-none"><i data-hook="cmps-review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5 review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base review-title a-color-base review-title-content a-text-bold">







  
  
    <span>These headphones are amazing!</span>
  
</span></div><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date">Reviewed in Canada on August 9, 2024</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-color-secondary">Color: Black<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Style: Studio Pro<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Set: Without AppleCare+</span><i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i><a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=G75XTB7MBMBTXP6W"><span data-hook="avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></a></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span data-hook="review-body" class="a-size-base review-text"><div data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" style="max-height: none; height: 300px;"><div data-hook="review-collapsed" data-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content reviewText review-text-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content" style="padding-bottom: 20px;">







  
  
    <span>You will never have a better quality sound than these beats but there's pros and cons in every product so i'll list them<br>PROS<br>Pretty efficient, good sound quality, a pretty good noise cancellation and pretty good to fold them as you can transport them anywhere with the case. Really great for relaxing and travelling from afar, pretty great for a headphones you'll want to keep for a few years, pretty rough as i smash them on the ground while walking because i'm a clumsy ass but it didn't scratch a little bit<br>CONS<br>They can be irritable to wear for a while, also the noise cancellation have a weird knocking noise on the left ear that can be annoying if you do focused tasks ( DO NOT WORRY, IT ONLY HAPPENED WHEN YOU NEAR AN INTERNET ROUTER, YOU CAN ALWAYS CANCEL IT BY TURNING DOWN THE NOISE CANCELLATION), Also, a lot of the time, i had to cancel my bluethooth near my phone so that my tablet will connect to it as it doesn't have an M1 ship, which can be able to be focused on one apple device or android device, also gym is not recommended as it falls after a deadlift<br><br>Overall, i recommend them for travelling, relaxing or studying.<br></span>
  
</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header" style="opacity: 1; display: block;"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-interaction-events="click" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" aria-label="Toggle full review text" aria-expanded="false" role="button" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read more&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read less&quot;}" data-csa-c-id="6qrplt-6t3kh7-57hxd1-1vjyfv"><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Read more</span></a></div></div></span></div><div data-hook="review-comments" class="a-row review-comments cr-vote-action-bar"><span class="cr-vote" data-hook="review-voting-widget">

    <span>Turn it up or turn it off</span>

    <span>Awesome wish I could get them louder though otherwise good product<br></span>

        <span><span class="a-declarative" data-action="reviews:report-abusive-review-modal-button" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-reviews:report-abusive-review-modal-button" data-reviews:report-abusive-review-modal-button="{&quot;closeButton&quot;:&quot;true&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;report-abusive-review-modal-popover-RS0XQK6G7QBA9&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:&quot;350&quot;,&quot;header&quot;:&quot;Report this review&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;/hz/reviews-render/report-review?ie=UTF8&amp;ref=cm_cr_dp_d_freport&amp;csrfT=hKtko1hwsvedzlWTvbZiYg004QdJKQBioQNM%2FmKh2E5dAAAAAGcT91oAAAAB&amp;reviewId=RS0XQK6G7QBA9&quot;}" id="report-abusive-review-modal-popover-RS0XQK6G7QBA9" data-csa-c-id="nwjp10-1thusy-nonyet-wweb7u"><a class="a-size-base a-link-normal a-color-secondary report-abuse-link a-text-normal" href="/hz/reviews-render/report-review?ie=UTF8&amp;ref=cm_cr_dp_d_freport&amp;csrfT=hKtko1hwsvedzlWTvbZiYg004QdJKQBioQNM%2FmKh2E5dAAAAAGcT91oAAAAB&amp;reviewId=RS0XQK6G7QBA9">Report</a></span></span></span>

  <div data-hook="genome-widget" class="a-row a-spacing-mini"><div class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"><noscript><img src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">LB</span></div></div></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-none"><i data-hook="cmps-review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-4 review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">4.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base review-title a-color-base review-title-content a-text-bold">







  
  
    <span>Colour is flat, more brown than photo.</span>
  
</span></div><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date">Reviewed in Canada on October 13, 2024</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-color-secondary">Color: Earth<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Style: Studio Pro<i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Set: Without AppleCare+</span><i aria-hidden="true" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i><a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=G75XTB7MBMBTXP6W"><span data-hook="avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></a></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span data-hook="review-body" class="a-size-base review-text"><div data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" style="max-height:300px"><div data-hook="review-collapsed" data-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content reviewText review-text-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content">







  
  
    <span>Sounds is good, as expected.<br><br>Esthetically, the colour 'earth' is flat and more brown than the photos for advertising show. There is no sheen on them.  I was expecting a more PEI earth look, like photos, not so, straight dirt brown.  Headphone joints seem fragile as they creak and crackle when you fold them in.  Had a cheaper pair of AKG on ear headphones that hardware wise seemed to be better quality.  However, sound is impressive compared to those headphones, and that is what you are paying for.<br></span>
  
</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header" style="opacity: 0; display: none;"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-interaction-events="click" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" aria-label="Toggle full review text" aria-expanded="false" role="button" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read more&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read less&quot;}" data-csa-c-id="dxtja5-cxgx7x-7gjnym-e272fj"><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Read more</span></a></div></div></span></div><div data-hook="review-comments" class="a-row review-comments cr-vote-action-bar"><span class="cr-vote" data-hook="review-voting-widget">

                              <div id="cloudfront-web-bug_feature_div" class="celwidget" data-feature-name="cloudfront-web-bug" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-content-id="cloudfront-web-bug" data-csa-c-slot-id="cloudfront-web-bug_feature_div" data-csa-c-asin="" data-csa-c-is-in-initial-active-row="false" data-csa-c-id="d3ous6-aku9mp-e2jngo-wsp8hm" data-cel-widget="cloudfront-web-bug_feature_div">
                            


 

<script type="text/javascript">
// This will fetch the resource in a low impact way from the experiment server.
// executeOnload will prevent fetching the resource until everything else on the page has loaded.
var cloudfrontImg = new Image();
var shouldExecuteOnload = ("1" == "1");
if (shouldExecuteOnload) {
    if (window.addEventListener) {
        window.addEventListener("load", function() {
            setTimeout(function(){ cloudfrontImg.src = "//cloudfront-labs.amazonaws.com/x.png"; }, 400);}, false);
    } else if (window.attachEvent) {
        window.attachEvent("onload", function() {
            setTimeout(function(){ cloudfrontImg.src = "//cloudfront-labs.amazonaws.com/x.png"; }, 400);});
    }
} else {
    setTimeout(function(){ cloudfrontImg.src = "//cloudfront-labs.amazonaws.com/x.png"; }, 400);
}
</script>

<script language="JavaScript">

  <script type="text/javascript">
    // Only execute if performance object is defined in JS
    if(typeof performance!= "undefined" && typeof performance.getEntries != "undefined") {

    
        var metaAssetNames = [];
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageMetaAssetFixed");
        metaAssetNames.push("AXFClientPluginAsset");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageEverywhereMetaAsset");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPagePriceTrackerAssets");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageProductSpecDepthAsset");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageBulkBuyingAssets");
        metaAssetNames.push("USAmazonDevicesDetailPageMetaAssets");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageWirelessPlansAssets");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageBTFSubNavDesktopAsset");
        metaAssetNames.push("WarrantyAttachMetaAsset_BUYX_DP_RPCX_TPLUS_SUBASSETING_897079");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageTurboCheckoutDesktopAssets");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPagePostPurchaseAssets");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageNostosAssets");
        metaAssetNames.push("InstallmentPaymentDetailPageMetaAsset");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageTechTermAssistAssets");
        if(metaAssetNames.length > 0)  {
            for(assetIndex = 0; assetIndex < metaAssetNames.length; assetIndex ++) {
	     var metaAssetName = metaAssetNames[assetIndex];
             var re = new RegExp("\\.css\\?AUIClients/" + metaAssetName); 
             for(i = 0; i < performance.getEntries().length; i++) {	   	
                var dpEntry = performance.getEntries()[i];
		var res = dpEntry.name.match(re);
                if(res && dpEntry.initiatorType  && dpEntry.initiatorType == "link") {
                    var dpmaDuration = dpEntry.duration;
                    ue.count(metaAssetName +".duration", dpmaDuration);
                    if(dpmaDuration < 50) {
                        ue.tag(metaAssetName + "Cached");
                    } else {
                        ue.tag(metaAssetName + "NotCached");
                    }
                    ue.count(metaAssetName + ".startTime", dpEntry.startTime);
                }
	      }
	    }
        }
        else {
                ue.count("DPMANoMetaAsset", 1);
        }

        for(i = 0 ; i < performance.getEntries().length ; i++) {
            var name = performance.getEntries()[i].name ;
            var res = name.match(/\.css\?AUIClients\/AmazonUI/);
	    var initiatorType = performance.getEntries()[i].initiatorType;
            if(res && initiatorType && initiatorType == "link") {
                var duration = performance.getEntries()[i].duration ;
                ue.count("aui.duration", duration);
                ue.count("aui.startTime", performance.getEntries()[i].startTime);
                if(duration < 50) {
                    csmTag = "auiCached";
                }
                else {
                    csmTag = "auiNotCached";
                }

                if(window.ue && ue.tag) {
                    ue.tag(csmTag);
                }
                break;
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

function prefetchTYPAssets() {
    var imageAssets = new Array();
    var jsCssAssets = new Array();
      imageAssets.push("https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/buy-buttons/review-1-click-order._CB485945748_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/buttons/continue-shopping._CB485936085_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/buy-buttons/thank-you-elbow._CB485935881_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/communities/social/snwicons_v2._CB485949224_.png");
      imageAssets.push("https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/checkout/assets/carrot._CB485936886_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/checkout/thank-you-page/assets/yellow-rounded-corner-sprite._CB485934148_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/checkout/thank-you-page/assets/white-rounded-corner-sprite._CB485935362_.gif");

    // pre-fetching image assets
    for (var i=0; i<imageAssets.length; i++) {
       new Image().src = imageAssets[i];
    }
    // pre-fetching css and js assets based on different browser types
    var isIE = /*@cc_on!@*/0;
    var isFireFox = /Firefox/.test(navigator.userAgent);
    if (isIE) {
      for (var i=0; i<jsCssAssets.length; i++) {
        new Image().src = jsCssAssets[i];
      }
    }
    else if (isFireFox) {
      for (var i=0; i<jsCssAssets.length; i++) {
        var o =  document.createElement("object");
        o.data = jsCssAssets[i];
        o.width = o.height = 0;
        document.body.appendChild(o);
      }
    }
}

    var onload = function () {
        setTimeout(prefetchTYPAssets, 2000);
    };
    if (window.addEventListener) {
        window.addEventListener("load", onload);
    } else if (window.attachEvent) { /* for <= IE 8 */
        window.attachEvent("onload", onload);
    }
</script>

<input type="hidden" name="1click-tsdelta" id="1click-tsdelta">

var ocInitTimestamp = 1729361754;
</script>
